original_title: Sri Lankan children win multiple trophies at UCMAS international competition in New Delhi
original_body_lines: The UCMAS Sri Lanka contingent was successful in winning 16 Championships, 16 First Runners Up and 20 Second Runners Up Trophies at the UCMAS International Level Competition held recently in New Delhi. The Sri Lanka Team was also successful in winning the Bronze Trophy amongst the many international participants at the World Cup Tournament held there.

A total of 103 students representing the UCMAS Sri Lanka Team, participated at the UCMAS International Competition. 52 of these participants being successful in winning Trophies for the country, is a case in point. This a great and historical win for Sri Lanka, the President and CEO of UCMAS Sri Lanka, Shankar (Vijay Sivashankar) speaking at the occasion said:” Our students successfully competed with more than six thousand International Competitors from 30 countries and showed their prowess. I greatly appreciate their dedication, skill and commitment, he added. Our Vision is to give the best to our children and we took great pains to achieve this. We are committed towards giving to our Island Nation, children who will be tomorrow’s Leaders, he further added.
